name: Floomy
description:
Floomy, the adorable pink bunny-like hero, embarks on a daunting quest to vanquish an ancient evil that threatens all existence. As Floomy, you'll hop onto a variety of critters in a desperate effort to clear the perilous gaps that stand between you and each level's goal. Sounds easy enough, right? NOPE! Check your expectations as there are zero checkpoints. So Prepare to embrace failure as a stepping stone to progress. With each attempt, you'll collect precious gems that can be spent on upgrades at the Hop Shop. Combined with your growing experience, these enhancements will assist you in conquering the formidable gauntlet that awaits.

Enhance Floomy's abilties!


No effort goes unrewarded! Each run, you'll earn gems that can be spent to enhance Floomy's abilities via the Hop Shop. Tired of falling victim to hazardous flora? Then the Thick Skin enhancement is for you!

Hop in style!


Or maybe you are all about fashion! In that case, throw your hard-earned gems at hats and skins. Nothing can stop you from hopping in style!

Features:


  • Beautifully handcrafted pixel art aesthetic that is equal parts adorable and exciting.
  • 27 levels designed to encourage speedrunning as players grow more proficient over time.
  • Levels are divided into 5 distinct zones with each featuring a different aesthetic.
  • Various critters that influence player mobility differently.
  • A challenging gameplay experience that's easy to learn but difficult to master.

Pro-Tips:


  • Hop on critters to make your way to each goal. There aren't many stable platforms to stand on so keep moving!
  • Don't be afraid to speedrun! Discover tricks and maneuvers to get through each stage faster.
  • Embrace Death! Mastery is all about good timing so get comfortable with trial and error.
  • Most critters react to being hopped on differently. For instance, hopping on a blue birdy will propel Floomy upwards, while another might suck you up, then spit you out.
  • Don't forget to spend your gems at the Hop Shop to enhance Floomy's abilities!

You got this, now hop to it!
